channel.title: Comments for Project Pink Day
channel.description: A Year Off With Our Kids

item.title: Comment on A different shade of pink by Jessica M Austin
item.dc:creator: Jessica M Austin
item.description: Travis thanks for sharing this with me how inspiring and we all need this in our lives. I will miss working with you but hope to stay connected. You have a beautiful family!
item.content:encoded:
Travis thanks for sharing this with me how inspiring and we all need this in our lives. I will miss working with you but hope to stay connected. You have a beautiful family!

LikeLiked by 1 person

item.title: Comment on A different shade of pink by Kathy Green
item.dc:creator: Kathy Green
item.description: So happy for you Kelly! And your journey has inspired so many of us along the way. Drop me a line when you have time and let me know what you are doing.
item.content:encoded:
So happy for you Kelly! And your journey has inspired so many of us along the way. Drop me a line when you have time and let me know what you are doing.

LikeLike

item.title: Comment on A different shade of pink by Georgia
item.dc:creator: Georgia
item.description: It can't officially be over! I am close to tears and I want to keep reading about the shades of pink! You guys truly are an inspiration! All the best to all of you! Xo
item.content:encoded:
It can’t officially be over! I am close to tears and I want to keep reading about the shades of pink!
You guys truly are an inspiration! All the best to all of you! Xo

LikeLiked by 1 person

item.title: Comment on Quality time with family by Lynda Beam
item.dc:creator: Lynda Beam
item.description: Good! Glad to see another "episode." Was afraid you were going to retire Pink Day now that the year's over :)

item.title: Comment on When our skiing friends come to town by Matthew Graczyk
item.dc:creator: Matthew Graczyk
item.description: Great to see you guys. We bought a pass for next year so hopefully we can meet up again.
item.content:encoded:
Great to see you guys. We bought a pass for next year so hopefully we can meet up again.

item.title: Comment on When our skiing friends come to town by Michelle
item.dc:creator: Michelle
item.description: Wow!!!! With so much company I feel so grateful to be included and allowed to invade your home for a few days! Thanks for an awesome trip. I'm still thinking about those spicy bloody marys.
item.content:encoded:
Wow!!!! With so much company I feel so grateful to be included and allowed to invade your home for a few days! Thanks for an awesome trip. I’m still thinking about those spicy bloody marys.
